detailed_results.question: What is Zakat in Islam ?
detailed_results.prediction:
Zakat in Islam refers to a form of charity given to those who are less fortunate. In the context of Bangladesh, Zakat is donated to the Govt Zakat Fund.

Here are some key points about Zakat:

• It is paid by an assessee as Donation/Zakat.
• The donation must be made after one year of establishment of the organization (in this case, the Govt Zakat Fund).
• The donation is approved by the Social Welfare Department and the NBR.
